languages.text: "К-конечно! Как того и требует закон. К сожалению, вам придется встать в самый конец линии, ибо нет иного способа пройти к заверителю, кроме как через смирение и принятие".

traits.locale_text: "К-конечно! Как того и требует закон. К сожалению, вам придется встать в самый конец линии, ибо нет иного способа пройти к заверителю, кроме как через смирение и принятие".
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: "O-of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."
languages.original_text: "К-конечно! Как того и требует закон. К сожалению, вам придется встать в самый конец линии, ибо нет иного способа пройти к заверителю, кроме как через смирение и принятие".

traits.locale_text: "O-Of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "O-Of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "O-Of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "O-Of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: “没、没问题！法律就是这么规定的。但遗憾的是，您将不得不从队尾开始排起，毕竟只有谦逊、耐心的人，才能见到认证官。”
languages.original_text: "O-of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."

traits.locale_text: “没、没问题！法律就是这么规定的。但遗憾的是，您将不得不从队尾开始排起，毕竟只有谦逊、耐心的人，才能见到认证官。”
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Na-naturalmente! Es lo que dicta la ley. Sin embargo, tendrá que ponerse al final de la cola, pues la ruta que lleva al oficial de certificación exige humildad y aceptación».
languages.original_text: "O-of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."

traits.locale_text: «Na-naturalmente! Es lo que dicta la ley. Sin embargo, tendrá que ponerse al final de la cola, pues la ruta que lleva al oficial de certificación exige humildad y aceptación».
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「も、もちろんです！法のとおりです。残念ながら、陛下は列の最後になります。謙虚さと寛容さがなくては認証役にたどり着けないということです」
languages.original_text: "O-of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."

traits.locale_text: 「も、もちろんです！法のとおりです。残念ながら、陛下は列の最後になります。謙虚さと寛容さがなくては認証役にたどり着けないということです」
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: « B-Bien sûr ! Ainsi vont nos lois. Malheureusement, vous allez devoir vous placer tout au bout de la file d'attente, car l'humilité et la résignation sont le seul chemin menant à l'agent de certification. »
languages.original_text: "O-of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."

traits.locale_text: « B-Bien sûr ! Ainsi vont nos lois. Malheureusement, vous allez devoir vous placer tout au bout de la file d'attente, car l'humilité et la résignation sont le seul chemin menant à l'agent de certification. »
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Na-natürlich! So will es das Gesetz. Leider müsst Ihr Euch hinten anstellen, denn der einzige Weg zum Zertifizierungsoffizier führt über Demut und Duldung."
languages.original_text: "O-of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."

traits.locale_text: "Na-natürlich! So will es das Gesetz. Leider müsst Ihr Euch hinten anstellen, denn der einzige Weg zum Zertifizierungsoffizier führt über Demut und Duldung."
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Ta... Tabii! Kanun da bunu gerektirir. Ne yazık ki kuyruğun en sonuna geçmeniz gerekecek çünkü tasdikname memuruna giden yol, tevazu ve kabullenmeden geçer."
languages.original_text: "O-of course! So the law dictates. Unfortunately, you will have to join the very end of the queue, for there is no route to the certification officer but through humility and acceptance."

traits.locale_text: "Ta... Tabii! Kanun da bunu gerektirir. Ne yazık ki kuyruğun en sonuna geçmeniz gerekecek çünkü tasdikname memuruna giden yol, tevazu ve kabullenmeden geçer."
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals
